content.icerik: Nourishing & Hydrating Face Cream This nourishing & hydrating face cream with UV-Protection is developed for dry skin. Enriched with apricot extract and apricot seed oil, Vitamin A & E, it ensure effective protection against free radicals and erases the traces of time. Pentavitin® is a very strong hydrating active, leaving the skin soft and smooth. Peptamide-6 increases skin firmness. Applied regularly the skin becomes smooth and luminous, skin elasticity improves.
